channel.title: Can someone give me a review?
channel.description:
Can someone give me a review on what my site is lacking in that is causing not very many users to join.
*Link removed*
So I know why I'm such a failure so far.

item.title: Can someone give me a review?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I don’t see how this relates to web design. Anyone can install vBulletin you haven’t made anything for us to review.

I agree with pwnd. Locked.

Read full topic

item.source: Can someone give me a review?

item.title: Can someone give me a review?
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

Seems OK to me. The main reason as to why you’re not seeing enough growth in your community is the fact you’re not offering anything different from the thousands of other communities out there. There is no service or something specific to attract people to your website. It’s just a discussion forum for subjects covered on plenty of other successful sites.

Another thing I noticed is you’ve copied Moparisthebest in a few ways. The General Discussion is pretty much an exact copy of MITB’s General Discussion.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone give me a review?
